author: Andy Pearson
method: In a Boston or whisky glass, mash (muddle) the gooseberries with the sugar using the end of a clean rolling pin. Add the gin, elderflower cordial and lime juice. Shake well, then strain into a  highball glass filled with ice. Top up with lemonade and garnish with some fresh gooseberries and elderflowers.
ingredients: 4 gooseberries ,  2 tsp white sugar,  50ml/2fl oz gin ,  25ml/1fl oz elderflower cordial,  1 tbsp lime juice ,  traditional cloudy lemonade, to top up ,  gooseberries and fresh elderflowers, to garnish
